hola.title: HELLO
hola.content: Helloooooo, INTOLERABLE! :) I'm Mariantonieta, and I want to welcome you to my world.

historia.title: MY STORY
historia.content: This project was born from a very personal experience: being celiac and facing daily limitations in the kitchen...

proposito.title: PURPOSE
proposito.content: Here I offer you a space where you can find restaurants or recipes designed for various dietary needs...

motivacion.title: MOTIVATION
motivacion.content: I want to remind you that although having a FOOD INTOLERANCE can be frustrating, it makes you unique.

utilidad.title: WHAT IS THIS PAGE FOR?
utilidad.content: Here you can find both the recipe or the restaurant you're looking for. The search is different because it ensures that when you arrive, it's a safe place for your intolerance.
